mention.text: Family , friends and colleagues of Associated Press correspondent Terry A. Anderson
friends and colleagues of Associated Press correspondent Terry A. Anderson
Associated Press correspondent Terry A. Anderson
both his father and his brother
his daughter , who will turn 5 in June
A home without a husband or father
reporters Friday whether he had any optimistic news for the families of the hostages
a spokesman for the Moujahedeen , the principal Iranian opposition group
a card to play for internal political purposes
just not in their interest to release the hostages
a Washington-based support group for the families of the hostages
former hostages Jean-Paul Kauffman and Roger Auque
